channel.title: Tailwind :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Integrating Tailwind While PrimeVue includes many helpful components we can use in our application, we may still need to adjust the layout a bit to match our expected style. For example, right now the content of each of our views has no margins or padding around it: While we can easily write our own CSS directives to handle this, now is a good time to look at one of the more modern CSS libraries to see how to make this process much easier.
